intro: Artanthe dasyoura, commonly known as the silverleaf artanthe, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its silver-green foliage and showy, daisy-like flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its compact growth habit makes it suitable for rock gardens and containers. Artanthe dasyoura is drought-tolerant and requires minimal maintenance once established.
